title: How I convert hard water to soft water at home? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are a few methods to convert hard water to soft water at home. One is by adding some baking soda in hard water. Another method is by adding distilled vinegar in hard water. Another method is by boiling hard water in case of temporary hardness.
